name: Beams & Mirrors
description:
BEAMS & MIRRORS

In this casual puzzle mobile game, your goal is to guide the beam(s) of light to the receivers in order to establish a connection. 

You can achieve this by using a selection of fun gadgets, but try to be as efficient with them as you can to get the highest score.
